item.title: 多线程::交替打印FooBar
item.description:
链接

1115. 交替打印 FooBar - 力扣（LeetCode）

解法一： Semaphore

class FooBar {
    private int n;

    Semaphore foo = new Semaphore(1);

    Semaphore bar = new Semaphore(0);

    public FooBar(int n) {
        this.n = n;
    }

    public void foo(Runnable printFoo) throws InterruptedException {

        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {

            // printFoo.run() outputs "foo". Do not change or remove this line.
            foo.acquire();
            printFoo.run();
            bar.release();
        }
    }

    public void bar(Runnable printBar) throws InterruptedException {

        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {

            // printBar.run() outputs "bar". Do not change or remove this line.
            bar.acquire();;
            printBar.run();
            foo.release();
        }
    }
}

解法二：Spin Lock

class FooBar {
    private int n;

    private volatile boolean flag = false;

    public FooBar(int n) {
        this.n = n;
    }

    public void foo(Runnable printFoo) throws InterruptedException {

        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {

            // printFoo.run() outputs "foo". Do not change or remove this line.
            // 如果while的循环体里面不加yield会导致超时，它可能不会自己让出cpu
            while (flag) {Thread.yield();}
            printFoo.run();
            flag = !flag;
        }
    }

    public void bar(Runnable printBar) throws InterruptedException {

        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            // printBar.run() outputs "bar". Do not change or remove this line.
            while (!flag) {Thread.yield();}
            printBar.run();
            flag = !flag;
        }
    }
}

解法三：Lock + Conditon

class FooBar {
    private int n;

    ReentrantLock lock = new ReentrantLock();

    Condition foo = lock.newCondition();

    Condition bar = lock.newCondition();

    volatile boolean flag = false;

    public FooBar(int n) {
        this.n = n;
    }

    public void foo(Runnable printFoo) throws InterruptedException {

        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {

            // printFoo.run() outputs "foo". Do not change or remove this line.
            lock.lock();
            if (flag) {
                foo.await();
            }
            printFoo.run();
            flag = !flag;
            bar.signal();
            lock.unlock();
        }
    }

    public void bar(Runnable printBar) throws InterruptedException {

        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {

            // printBar.run() outputs "bar". Do not change or remove this line.
            lock.lock();
            if (!flag) {
                bar.await();
            }
            printBar.run();
            flag = !flag;
            foo.signal();
            lock.unlock();
        }
    }
}

解法四：LockSupport

class FooBar {
    private int n;

    private boolean flag = true;

    Thread foo = null;

    Thread bar = null;

    public FooBar(int n) {
        this.n = n;
    }

    public void foo(Runnable printFoo) throws InterruptedException {

        foo = Thread.currentThread();
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            if (!flag) {
                LockSupport.park();
            }
            // printFoo.run() outputs "foo". Do not change or remove this line.
            printFoo.run();
            flag = !flag;
            LockSupport.unpark(bar);
        }
    }

    public void bar(Runnable printBar) throws InterruptedException {

        bar = Thread.currentThread();
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {

            // printBar.run() outputs "bar". Do not change or remove this line.
            if (flag) {
                LockSupport.park();
            }
            printBar.run();
            flag = !flag;
            LockSupport.unpark(foo);
            ;
        }
    }
}

解法五：Synchronized + wait/notifyAll

class FooBar {
    private int n;

    Object lock = new Object();

    volatile boolean flag = false;

    public FooBar(int n) {
        this.n = n;
    }

    public void foo(Runnable printFoo) throws InterruptedException {

        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            // printFoo.run() outputs "foo". Do not change or remove this line.
            synchronized (lock) {
                if (flag) {
                    lock.wait();
                }
                printFoo.run();
                flag = !flag;
                lock.notifyAll();
            }
        }
    }

    public void bar(Runnable printBar) throws InterruptedException {

        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {

            // printBar.run() outputs "bar". Do not change or remove this line.
            synchronized (lock) {
                if (!flag){
                    lock.wait();
                }
                printBar.run();
                flag=!flag;
                lock.notifyAll();
            }
        }
    }
}

解法六：CyclicBarrier

class FooBar {
    private int n;

    CyclicBarrier barrier = new CyclicBarrier(2);

    volatile boolean flag = false;

    public FooBar(int n) {
        this.n = n;
    }

    public void foo(Runnable printFoo) throws InterruptedException {

        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
            // printFoo.run() outputs "foo". Do not change or remove this line.
            while (flag) {
                Thread.yield();
            }
            printFoo.run();
            flag = !flag;
            try {
                barrier.await();
            } catch (BrokenBarrierException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }
    }

    public void bar(Runnable printBar) throws InterruptedException {

        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {

            // printBar.run() outputs "bar". Do not change or remove this line.
            try {
                barrier.await();
            } catch (BrokenBarrierException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
            printBar.run();
            flag = !flag;
        }
    }
}

item.title: 算法::简单::第一个错误的版本
item.description:
链接

278. 第一个错误的版本 - 力扣（LeetCode）

解法

class Solution:
    def firstBadVersion(self, n):
        """
        :type n: int
        :rtype: int
        """
        left, mid, right = 1, -1, n
        while left < right:
            mid = left + (right - left) // 2
            if isBadVersion(mid):
                right = mid
            else:
                left = mid + 1
        return left

item.title: 算法::简单::二分查找
item.description:
链接

704. 二分查找 - 力扣（LeetCode）

解法

from typing import List

class Solution:
    def search(self, nums: List[int], target: int) -> int:
        left, right = 0, len(nums) - 1
        while left <= right:
            mid = left + (right - left) // 2
            if nums[mid] == target:
                return mid
            elif nums[mid] > target:
                right = mid - 1
            else:
                left = mid + 1
        return -1

item.title: 算法::简单::搜索插入位置
item.description:
链接

35. 搜索插入位置 - 力扣（LeetCode）

解法

from typing import List

class Solution:
    def searchInsert(self, nums: List[int], target: int) -> int:
        left, right = 0, len(nums) - 1
        while left <= right:
            mid = left + (right - left) // 2
            if nums[mid] == target:
                return mid
            if nums[mid] < target:
                left = mid + 1
            else:
                right = mid - 1
        return left

item.title: 多线程::按需打印
item.description:
链接

1114. 按序打印 - 力扣（LeetCode）

解法一：synchronized + wait/notifyAll

class Foo {

    final Object lock = new Object();

    volatile int count = 1;

    public Foo() {
    }

    public void first(Runnable printFirst) throws InterruptedException {

        // printFirst.run() outputs "first". Do not change or remove this line.
        synchronized (lock) {
            while (count != 1) {
                lock.wait();
            }
            printFirst.run();
            count = 2;
            lock.notifyAll();
        }
    }

    public void second(Runnable printSecond) throws InterruptedException {

        // printSecond.run() outputs "second". Do not change or remove this line.
        synchronized (lock) {
            while (count != 2) {
                lock.wait();
            }
            printSecond.run();
            count = 3;
            lock.notifyAll();
        }
    }

    public void third(Runnable printThird) throws InterruptedException {

        // printThird.run() outputs "third". Do not change or remove this line.
        synchronized (lock) {
            while (count != 3) {
                lock.wait();
            }
            printThird.run();
            count = 1;
            lock.notifyAll();
        }
    }
}

解法二：Semaphore

class Foo {

    Semaphore second = new Semaphore(0);

    Semaphore third = new Semaphore(0);

    public Foo() {
    }

    public void first(Runnable printFirst) throws InterruptedException {

        // printFirst.run() outputs "first". Do not change or remove this line.
        //
        printFirst.run();
        second.release();
    }

    public void second(Runnable printSecond) throws InterruptedException {

        // printSecond.run() outputs "second". Do not change or remove this line.
        second.acquire();
        printSecond.run();
        third.release();
    }

    public void third(Runnable printThird) throws InterruptedException {

        // printThird.run() outputs "third". Do not change or remove this line.
        third.acquire();
        printThird.run();
    }
}

解法三：Spin Lock

class Foo {

    volatile int count = 1;

    public Foo() {
    }

    public void first(Runnable printFirst) throws InterruptedException {

        // printFirst.run() outputs "first". Do not change or remove this line.
        //
        while (count != 1);
        printFirst.run();
        count = 2;
    }

    public void second(Runnable printSecond) throws InterruptedException {

        // printSecond.run() outputs "second". Do not change or remove this line.
        while (count != 2);
        printSecond.run();
        count = 3;
    }

    public void third(Runnable printThird) throws InterruptedException {

        // printThird.run() outputs "third". Do not change or remove this line.
        while (count != 3);
        printThird.run();
        count = 1;
    }
}

解法四：CountDownLatch

class Foo {

    CountDownLatch second = new CountDownLatch(1);

    CountDownLatch third = new CountDownLatch(1);

    public Foo() {
    }

    public void first(Runnable printFirst) throws InterruptedException {

        // printFirst.run() outputs "first". Do not change or remove this line.
        //
        printFirst.run();
        second.countDown();
    }

    public void second(Runnable printSecond) throws InterruptedException {

        // printSecond.run() outputs "second". Do not change or remove this line.
        second.await();
        printSecond.run();
        third.countDown();
    }

    public void third(Runnable printThird) throws InterruptedException {

        // printThird.run() outputs "third". Do not change or remove this line.
        third.await();
        printThird.run();
    }
}

解法五：Lock + Conditon

class Foo {

    ReentrantLock lock = new ReentrantLock();

    Condition first = lock.newCondition();

    Condition second = lock.newCondition();

    Condition third = lock.newCondition();

    volatile int count = 1;

    public Foo() {

    }

    public void first(Runnable printFirst) throws InterruptedException {

        // printFirst.run() outputs "first". Do not change or remove this line.
        lock.lock();
        if (count != 1) {
            first.await();
        }
        count = 2;
        printFirst.run();
        second.signal();
        lock.unlock();
    }

    public void second(Runnable printSecond) throws InterruptedException {

        // printSecond.run() outputs "second". Do not change or remove this line.
        lock.lock();
        if (count != 2) {
            second.await();
        }
        count = 3;
        printSecond.run();
        third.signal();
        lock.unlock();
    }

    public void third(Runnable printThird) throws InterruptedException {

        // printThird.run() outputs "third". Do not change or remove this line.
        lock.lock();
        if (count != 3) {
            third.await();
        }
        count = 1;
        printThird.run();
        first.signal();
        lock.unlock();
    }
}

解法六：CyclicBarrier

class Foo {

    CyclicBarrier first = new CyclicBarrier(2);

    CyclicBarrier second = new CyclicBarrier(2);

    public Foo() {

    }

    public void first(Runnable printFirst) throws InterruptedException {

        // printFirst.run() outputs "first". Do not change or remove this line.
        try {
            printFirst.run();
            first.await();
        } catch (BrokenBarrierException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public void second(Runnable printSecond) throws InterruptedException {

        // printSecond.run() outputs "second". Do not change or remove this line.
        try {
            first.await();
            printSecond.run();
            second.await();
        } catch (BrokenBarrierException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public void third(Runnable printThird) throws InterruptedException {

        // printThird.run() outputs "third". Do not change or remove this line.
        try {
            second.await();
            printThird.run();
        } catch (BrokenBarrierException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }
}

解法七：LockSupport

class Foo {

    Thread first = null;

    Thread second = null;

    Thread third = null;

    volatile int count = 1;

    public Foo() {

    }

    public void first(Runnable printFirst) throws InterruptedException {

        first = Thread.currentThread();
        // printFirst.run() outputs "first". Do not change or remove this line.
        printFirst.run();
        count = 2;
        LockSupport.unpark(second);
    }

    public void second(Runnable printSecond) throws InterruptedException {

        second = Thread.currentThread();
        // printSecond.run() outputs "second". Do not change or remove this line.
        if (count != 2) {
            LockSupport.park();
        }
        printSecond.run();
        count = 3;
        LockSupport.unpark(third);
    }

    public void third(Runnable printThird) throws InterruptedException {

        third = Thread.currentThread();
        // printThird.run() outputs "third". Do not change or remove this line.
        if (count != 3) {
            LockSupport.park();
        }
        printThird.run();
    }
}

解法八：Atomic

class Foo {

    AtomicInteger count = new AtomicInteger(1);

    public Foo() {

    }

    public void first(Runnable printFirst) throws InterruptedException {

        // printFirst.run() outputs "first". Do not change or remove this line.
        while (count.get() != 1);
        printFirst.run();
        count.getAndIncrement();

    }

    public void second(Runnable printSecond) throws InterruptedException {

        // printSecond.run() outputs "second". Do not change or remove this line.
        while (count.get() != 2);
        printSecond.run();
        count.getAndIncrement();

    }

    public void third(Runnable printThird) throws InterruptedException {

        // printThird.run() outputs "third". Do not change or remove this line.
        while (count.get() != 3);
        printThird.run();
    }
}

解法九：LongAddr

class Foo {

    LongAdder count = new LongAdder();

    public Foo() {

    }

    public void first(Runnable printFirst) throws InterruptedException {

        // printFirst.run() outputs "first". Do not change or remove this line.
        while (count.longValue() != 0);
        printFirst.run();
        count.increment();

    }

    public void second(Runnable printSecond) throws InterruptedException {

        // printSecond.run() outputs "second". Do not change or remove this line.
        while (count.longValue() != 1);
        printSecond.run();
        count.increment();

    }

    public void third(Runnable printThird) throws InterruptedException {

        // printThird.run() outputs "third". Do not change or remove this line.
        while (count.longValue() != 2);
        printThird.run();
    }
}
